com.xilinx.rapidwright.design.merge

Class MergeDesigns

  • Object
    • com.xilinx.rapidwright.design.merge.MergeDesigns

  • public class MergeDesigns
extends Object
    Merges two or more designs into a single Design. Merge process can be customized through the use of the @link AbstractDesignMerger interface.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • mergeDesigns

        public static Design mergeDesigns(Design... designs)

      • mergeDesigns

        public static Design mergeDesigns(Supplier<AbstractDesignMerger> merger,
                                  Design... designs)
        Merges two or more designs together into a single design. Merges both logical and physical netlist. Assumes that designs are compatible for merging. Assumes that if there are duplicate cells in the set of designs to be merged that they are flip-flops and that they are always connected to a top-level port.
        Parameters:
        merger - The specific design merger instance to use to merge the designs
        designs - The set of designs to be merged into a single design.
        Returns:
        The merged design that contains the superset of all logic, placement and routing of the input designs.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws InterruptedException
        Searches recursively in the given input directory for DCPs and presents the set of those DCPs to MergeDesigns.mergeDesigns() with the default set of options.
        Parameters:
        args - [0]=Input directory of source DCPs to search recursively, [1]=Merged DCP output filename and an optional [2]=An optional regular expression string to apply to DCPs found in [0].
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
